body:
Well, I'm currently building my long awaited PC, and I'm having a couple of issues, to say the least. I know there are some people who have built various different computers, and I'm seeking some help. I've entirely put in my motherboard and all of it's components, but I'm having trouble connecting everything together. If you're willing to help me, it probably won't take more than 15 minutes because I'm really not that smart, and it's probably quite simple. Kindest regards.

Skype: drew.marchant1

title: PC Help

replies.body:
Look at the Manuel. I'm pretty damn sure it's the power and reset LEDs (the very small ones that are confusing).

If not, can you tell me what the thing looks like?

replies.body: Fucked up with the LEDS, thanks bro.
